title: I haven't seen someone this rude and tilted on this game in a long time
body:
I've been playing this game for 4 years, and I've seen my fair share of insults, rude behaviour and threats, but this just takes the cake. I was actually kinda surprised by this guy. I've censored names as to not name and shame, but wow.

This was only 9 minutes in the game and he wasn't doing well. Both teams were joking around, just some competitive BS and shit like that. And he went off.

All this deserves is a good ol' fashioned le gasp.

https://puu.sh/A5n82/93e0110759.png

replies.body: what makes it even better is its a yasuo

Hold my beer!

Sometime last week, someone ordered me to shoot my mother.
LMFAO... come to OCE and look for the guys who uses smite in every lane and you'll be in for a shock :P
Not to be confrontational, but that is pretty standard edgy teen shit.
The classic toxic 12 year old edgy minecraft yasuo.
Sadly that's pretty standard go-to. It's not acceptable, but it's also not very creative or noteworthy.
